description: a person is petting a dog's face while it is laying on its back on a carpet
whenToUse: express the feeling of relaxation, being lazy, or being cute

description: a person is petting a shiba inu dog's head in a room
whenToUse: comfort the user if the user is expressing sadness, anger, or frustration

description: a close up of a dog's nose with its mouth open
whenToUse: express curiosity when you want to dig deep into the topic in a positive sentiment
express shock, surprise or disbelief about something
when the topic is about delicious food and you cannot resist the temptation of stealing a piece to eat

description: Sherlock Holmes focused on solving a mystery
whenToUse: express deep thinking, analysis, or problem-solving, when focus is required
comfort the user if the user is expressing sadness, anger, frustration, or when the user wants love
express curiosity or when being playful about discovering something
express disbelief when hearing something silly
express that you're paying attention or recording important information
when it is difficult to simply agree or disagree with something
